channel.title: Projects on YufanZ
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on YufanZ

item.title: Blockchain Network Analysis: A Comparative Studies of Decentralized Banks
item.description: Authors: Yufan Zhang, Zichao Chen, Yutong Sun, Yulin Liu, Luyao Zhang Paper accepted by SAI Computing Conference GitHub Abstract Decentralized finance (DeFi) is known for its unique mechanism design, which applies smart contracts to facilitate peer-to-peer transactions. The decentralized bank is a typical application of DeFi. Ideally, a decentralized bank should be decentralized in the transaction. However, many recent studies have found that decentralized bank has not achieved a significant degree of decentralization.

item.title: MF-Net: A Novel Stylized Multilingual Font Generation Method
item.description: Authors: Yufan Zhang, Junkai Man, Peng Sun Poster presented at ACM Multimedia 2022 DOI: 10.1145/3503161.3548414 GitHub | MFont.net (coming soon in next year) Abstract Creating a complete stylized font library that helps the audience to perceive information from the text often requires years of study and proficiency in the use of many professional tools. Accordingly, automatic stylized font generation in a deep learning-based fashion is a desirable but challenging task that has attracted a lot of attention in recent years.

item.title: Visualizing NFT Ethics: A Case Study on CryptoPunks
item.description: Investigate CryptoPunks, the most famous collection in the NFT market, to explore and visualize its potential ethical issues.

item.title: Using AlphaFold and GNN to Predict Catalytic Efficiency
item.description: Supervisors: Dr. Gaoyang Li, Prof. Huansheng Cao Yufan Zhang, Yiyang Sun, Yang Yu, Jinxuan Zhang, Zixu Geng GitHub Using AlphaFold and GNN to Predict Catalytic Efficiency of Enzymes Network Scratch
